channel.title: NPC Questions
channel.description: 1. Everytime i add an npc in autospawn cfg. does it go to npchandler.java also? 2. I have certain npcs for shops, if i want to add text above there heads do i go to npchandler and find there ids? If so how do i know its the right one. ( 2 of the same npc)

item.title: NPC Questions
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

There is no need to add it to the NPCHandler class, unless you’re trying to make it perform an action.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Questions
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

  1. No you would have to add it there yourself.
  2. Yes go to npchandler

If you have 2 of the same npc’s out they will say the same thing.
Anything you set that id to say, it doesn’t matter how many you spawn if it has the same id it will say whatever you set it to say.

Read full topic
